title: Discussion board posting issue
body:
I am current level 16 in game, but it doesn't seem to have registered with the board, and I cannot post due to not being above level 7. I have re-logged, restarted client and browser.
Thank you

replies.body: Your profile was out of sync, but your post here seems to have updated you.  ^^
Yep, it's fix. Thanks for the update.
